r.s: Create and parse Internet Mail Consortium-style files (like vCard and vCalendar)
r.d:
Allows you to programmatically create a vCard or vCalendar, and fetch the text.
IMPORTANT: The array structure has changed slightly from Contact_Vcard_Parse. See the example output for the new structure. Also different from Contact_Vcard is the use of a factory pattern. Again, see the examples.
r.n: * Added file_exists() check to prevent E_NOTICE errors in factory if file doesn't exist (thanks, Davey) * Cleaned up error handling to let the user app have control (File_IMC_Build::raiseError() no longer passes a PEAR_ERROR_* to PEAR::raiseError()) (thanks, Greg) * Minor documentation additions/modifications (thanks, Greg)
